name: Vault: Strauss & Co Mullineux Olerasay 2001-2020
description: Strauss Mullineux Olerasay 1-20 includes the first 20 iterations of Mullineux Olerasay, the benchmark sweet wine. Containing 6 bottles per release, the second iteration received the first South African 100 points from a US based wine publication by Neal Martin. Neal suggests a drinking window from 2020-2080!
